data.price: Elbette zorluğun yanında bir kolaylık vardır.
Gerçekten, zorlukla beraber bir kolaylık daha vardır.

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
